displaytitle: Saint Martin with His Horse in a Boat
dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 32 × 42.8 cm (12 5/8 × 16 7/8 in.)
inscribed:
Inscribed in plate, center left: • S • MARTINI

Inscribed in plate, lower right corner: Ibernimus bos inuetor / • H • COCK EXC.

titles.title: Saint Martin with His Horse in a Boat

caption: Attributed to Jan van Doetechum the Elder or (active 1554–after 1600; born Deventer, Netherlands; died Haarlem, Netherlands), or attributed to Lucas A. van Doetechum (ca. 1554–before 1584; born Deventer, Netherlands), after Hieronymus Bosch (ca. 1450–1516, born Holland, Netherlands; died  's Hertogenbosch, Netherlands), Engraved by Hieronymus Cock (1507–1570; born and died  Antwerp, Belgium), Saint Martin with His Horse in a Boat, ca. 1561. Engraving; 32 × 42.8 cm (plate, sheet trimmed to plate). Bequest of Charles A. Ryskamp (2010-141)
captionhtml: Attributed to Jan van Doetechum the Elder or (active 1554–after 1600; born Deventer, Netherlands; died Haarlem, Netherlands), or attributed to Lucas A. van Doetechum (ca. 1554–before 1584; born Deventer, Netherlands), after Hieronymus Bosch (ca. 1450–1516, born Holland, Netherlands; died 's Hertogenbosch, Netherlands), Engraved by Hieronymus Cock (1507–1570; born and died Antwerp, Belgium), Saint Martin with His Horse in a Boat, ca. 1561. Engraving; 32 × 42.8 cm (plate, sheet trimmed to plate). Bequest of Charles A. Ryskamp (2010-141)
